OEE1Kn_xml.rpt OEE1_Platz
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$OEE1_Platz' set @Schicht = '$OEE1_Schicht' set @PerioId = '$OEE1_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' begin try drop table #tmpOEE1 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_OEE1','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_SchichtBez ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_SchichtNr ,OEE1_Schicht as GWNr ,S935_Bez as GwBez ,OEE1_Platz.* ,T905_ArbMasch.*,T904_Kostenstellen.*,T901_Firma.* into #tmpOEE1 from KSAlias.dbo.OEE1_Platz inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = OEE1_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = OEE1_Platz and OEE1_PerioId like @PerioId inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = OEE1_FirmaNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = OEE1_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = OEE1_Schicht order by OEE1_Platz,OEE1_Schicht,OEE1_PerioId,OEE1_Datum select * from #tmpOEE1 inner join ( Select OEE1_Platz as Kst,GWNr as GW,OEE1_PerioId as Perioid,sum(OEE1_t_Soll) as w from #tmpOEE1 group by OEE1_Platz,GWNr,OEE1_PerioId having not sum(OEE1_t_soll) = 0 ) as T on OEE1_Platz = Kst and GwNr = GW and OEE1_Perioid = PerioId where OEE1_Platz like @Platz and OEE1_Schicht like @Schicht order by OEE1_Platz ,GwNr,OEE1_PerioId,OEE1_Datum OEE1_SumVM declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @PerioId = '$OEE1_PERIOID' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' Select * from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_OEE1SumVM('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) 1

Rep_K001_TA61Kn_xml.rpt TA61_ProdSum
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$OM61_Kst' set @Schicht = '$OM61_TEAM' set @PerioId = '$OM61_PERIOID' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_OM61Kn','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSchIn ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('Prt_t_IstoGK','DEU') as Prt_t_Ist ,TeamSchKn as GWNr ,S935_Bez as GwBez ,TM61EFG.*,T905_ArbMasch.*,T904_Kostenstellen.*,T901_Firma.* ,cast(ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue('G_COMPNR','TA53Karenz') as int) as Karenz into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_OM61EFG(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PrtKn) as TM61EFG inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr -- inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum select * from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_Kst as Kst,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as Perioid,sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) as w from #tmpTA61 group by TA61_Kst,GWNr,TA61_PerioId having not sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) = 0 ) as T on TA61_Kst = Kst and GwNr = GW and TA61_Perioid = PerioId where TA61_Kst like @Platz and TA61_Schicht like @Schicht order by TA61_Kst,GwNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61_SumVM declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') Select *,0 as TA61_PersNr from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_OM61SumVMSzallEFG('G_COMPNR','$OM61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

Rep_K001_TA61Kn_xml.rpt TA61_ProdSum
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$OM61_Kst' set @Schicht = '$OM61_TEAM' set @PerioId = '$OM61_PERIOID' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_OM61PlKn','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSchIn ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('Prt_t_Ist','DEU') as Prt_t_Ist ,TeamSchKn as GWNr ,S935_Bez as GwBez ,TM61EFG.*,T905_ArbMasch.*,T904_Kostenstellen.*,T901_Firma.* ,cast(ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue('G_COMPNR','TA53Karenz') as int) as Karenz into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_OM61PlEFG(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PrtKn) as TM61EFG inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr -- inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum select * from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_Kst as Kst,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as Perioid,sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) as w from #tmpTA61 group by TA61_Kst,GWNr,TA61_PerioId having not sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) = 0 ) as T on TA61_Kst = Kst and GwNr = GW and TA61_Perioid = PerioId where TA61_Kst like @Platz and TA61_Schicht like @Schicht order by TA61_Kst,GwNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61_SumVM declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') Select *,0 as TA61_PersNr from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_OM61PlSumVMSzallEFG('G_COMPNR','$OM61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

DA53_P4_xml.rpt DA53_GK
Select T905_Nr,T905_Bez from T905_ArbMasch where T905_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' T905_Nr T905 exec ksmaster.dbo.kspr_DM53 'G_COMPNR','G_SESSIONID','','_PER_DAYVON','_PER_DAYBIS','_PER_KWVON','_PER_KWBIS','_PER_MMVON','_PER_MMBIS','_PER_QVON','_PER_QBIS','_PER_YYVON','_PER_YYBIS' declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$DA60_Nr' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' SELECT DM53_FirmaNR as DA53_FirmaNr,DM53_Sid as DA53_SID,DM53_PerioType as DA53_PerioType,DM53_Nr as DA53_Nr,0 as DA53_PersNr ,DM53_PerioId as DA53_PerioId ,DM53_GKArt ,DM53_Team as GW ,DM53_GKPrz as GKWert ,DM53_t_Ist as DA53_t_ist ,DM53_t_GKSum as DA53_t_GKSum ,DM53_GKPrz as DA53_GKPrz ,DM53_MW as DA53_MW ,DM53_TL as DA53_TL,DM53_TL_Slope as DA53_TL_Slope,DM53_TL_OffSet as DA53_TL_OffSet ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_DM53_P4','G_LANG') as PRTHead ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez,T901_Logo ,'' as T910_Name,'' as T910_Vorname ,T842_Bez as PName ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText(DM53_GKArt ,'G_LANG') as GKArtBez from DM53_GK inner join _TMPTABLE on _TMPTABLE_Text1 = DM53_Nr and DM53_PerioType <> 'Q' inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = DM53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = DM53_Nr and T905_Inaktiv = 0 inner join T842_Team on T842_FirmaNr = DM53_FirmaNr and T842_Nr = DM53_Team inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = DM53_FirmaNr where DM53_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and DM53_SID = 'G_SESSIONID' order by DM53_Nr,GW,DM53_GKArt,DM53_PerioType,DM53_PerioId DG1K800_FullPerio 0

@Schicht = '$OA61_SCHICHT' set @PerioId = '$OA61_PERIOID' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_OA61Kn','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSchIn ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('Prt_t_IstoGK','DEU') as Prt_t_Ist ,cast(TA61_Schicht as varchar(5)) as GWNr ,S935_Bez as GwBez ,0 as TA61_PersNr ,TA61EFG.*,T905_ArbMasch.*,T904_Kostenstellen.*,T901_Firma.* ,cast(ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue('G_COMPNR','TA53Karenz') as int) as Karenz into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_OA61EFG(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PrtKn) as TA61EFG inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum select * from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_Kst as Kst,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as Perioid,sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) as w from #tmpTA61 group by TA61_Kst,GWNr,TA61_PerioId having not sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) = 0 ) as T on TA61_Kst = Kst and GwNr = GW and TA61_Perioid = PerioId where TA61_Kst like @Platz and TA61_Schicht like @Schicht order by TA61_Kst,GwNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61_SumVM declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') Select *,0 as TA61_PersNr from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_OA61SumVMSzallEFG('G_COMPNR','$OA61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

-- Periode, alle Pltze in einer Zeile declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select TA53_Firmanr -- ,TA61_PerioId as TA53_PerioId -- ,TA61_Kst as TA53_Platz,TA61_Schicht as TA53_Schicht ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53GKMZEvd','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_Sch ,0 as TA61_PersNr ,0 as TA53_PersNr ,t.* ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez ,S935_Nr,S935_Bez ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53Platz('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) as t inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA53_Schicht inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_Platz like @Platz and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht 1

SC_Main.Panel1 Left 400 TA05YYTA20TA51YYTA20TA51YY select Ta51_persnr,TA05_ArtikelNr,TA05_ArtikelBez ,convert(varchar(6),ta51_tagid,112) as MM ,sum(TA51_MengeIstGut) as Menge from TA51_FABuchung inner join TA06_FAD1 on TA06_FirmaNr = TA51_FirmaNR and TA06_BelegNr = TA51_BelegNr inner join TA05_FAK1 on TA05_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA05_FA_NR = TA06_FA_NR where TA51_TagId between '01.07.2011' and '25.07.2011' and TA51_Typ = 1 and TA51_MengeIstGut > 0 group by Ta51_persnr,convert(varchar(4),ta51_tagid,112) ,convert(varchar(6),ta51_tagid,112) ,TA05_ArtikelNr,TA05_ArtikelBez 1

SC_2.Panel1 Top 400 TA05KWTA20TA51KWTA20TA51KW select Ta51_persnr,TA05_ArtikelNr,TA05_ArtikelBez ,convert(varchar(10),ta51_tagid,104) as Tag ,sum(TA51_MengeIstGut) as Menge from TA51_FABuchung inner join TA06_FAD1 on TA06_FirmaNr = TA51_FirmaNR and TA06_BelegNr = TA51_BelegNr inner join TA05_FAK1 on TA05_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA05_FA_NR = TA06_FA_NR where TA51_TagId between '01.07.2011' and '25.07.2011' and TA51_Typ = 1 and TA51_MengeIstGut > 0 group by Ta51_persnr ,convert(varchar(10),ta51_tagid,104) ,TA05_ArtikelNr,TA05_ArtikelBez 1

K001_TA70DetailPers_xml.rpt TA70_PraemieErg
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$TA70_Kst' set @PersNr = '$TA70_PersNr' set @PerioId = '$TA70_PERIODE' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' if Ltrim(@PersNr) = '0' set @PersNr = '%' if LTRIM(@PersNr)='>0' set @PersNr= '%' SELECT TA70_PraemieErg.* ,'' as T905_Nr, '' as T905_Bez ,T903_Bez ,T910_Name,T910_Vorname ,T901_Logo from TA70_PraemieErg inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA70_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA70_Kst inner join T903_Gruppen on T903_FirmaNR = TA70_FirmaNr and T903_NR = TA70_Gruppe inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNR = TA70_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA70_PersNr and T910_Entlohnung = 'akk' inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA70_FirmaNr where TA70_FirmaNr = @FirmaNr and TA70_Kst like @Platz and TA70_PersNr like @PersNr and TA70_Periode like @PerioId 1

DA63_P4_xml.rpt DA63_ProdSum
declare @xCalc int set @xCalc = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_BoolToInt('$FKT_CALCNEW') if @xCalc = 1 begin exec ksmaster.dbo.kspr_DA63 'G_COMPNR','G_SESSIONID','','$PerTagVon','$PerTagBis','$PerKWVon','$PerKWBis','$PerMMVon','$PerMMBis','$PerQVon','$PerQBis','$PerYYVon','$PerYYBis' end declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$DA63_Nr' set @Platz ='' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' SELECT DA63_FirmaNR ,DA63_Sid,DA63_PerioType,DA63_Nr,DA63_PersNr,DA63_Schicht,DA63_PerioId ,DA63_KnzBasis ,DA63_Pktel,DA63_ZielerfMW ,DA63_KnzZiel ,DA63_TL,DA63_TL_Slope,DA63_TL_OffSet ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_DA63_P4VP','G_LANG') as PRTHead ,'' as T905_Nr, '' as T905_Bez,'' as T904_Nr,'' as T904_Bez,T901_Logo ,T910_Name,T910_Vorname,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as PName from DA63_ProdSum inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = DA63_FirmaNr inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = DA63_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = DA63_PersNr and DA63_PerioType not in ('Q') where DA63_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and DA63_Nr like @Platz and DA63_SID = 'G_SESSIONID' and DA63_Schicht = 0 1

DA63_P4_xml.rpt DA63_ProdSum

SC_Main.Panel1 Left 400 TA20TA51_MMTA20TA51_MMTA20TA51_MM Select TA51_Persnr,TA05_ArtikelNr,TA05_ArtikelBez,MM,Sum(Menge) as Menge from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA20TA51('G_COMPNR') TA51_Persnr,TA05_ArtikelNr,TA05_ArtikelBez,MM 11

SC_Main.Panel1 Left 400 TA04_PRODK1TA04_PRODK1TA04_PRODK1 declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) declare @GrpProd varchar(10) set @GrpProd = '$PARAM5' SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + '] as ' + T908_Gruppe , ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + '] as ' + T908_Gruppe ) FROM KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' , ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' ) FROM KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe set @sql=' Select * from ( Select *, dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_StartTermin) as KWStart,dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_EndTermin) as KWEnd from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA05_Kd_AufNr ,' + @cols + ' from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA05_Kd_AufNr,T908_Gruppe as Gruppe ,cast((t.S3 + t.S9)/(t.S0 + t.S1 + t.S2+t.S3+t.S9 ) * 100 as int) as Prz from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr, TA05_Kd_AufNr,T908_Gruppe ,case when Sum([0]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([0]) as float) end as S0 ,case when Sum([1]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([1]) as float) end as S1 ,case when Sum([2]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([2]) as float) end as S2 ,case when Sum([3]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([3]) as float) end as S3 ,case when Sum([9]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([9]) as float) end as S9 from (Select TA06_FirmaNr ,TA05_Kd_AufNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat as AufStat,sum(TA06_Ist_Me) as IstMe, COUNT(TA06_BelegNr) as Cnt from KSAlias.dbo.TA06_FAD1 inner join KSAlias.dbo.TA05_FAK1 on TA05_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA05_FA_Nr = TA06_FA_Nr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz on T908_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and T908_Nr = ''' + @GrpProd + ''' and T908_platz = TA06_Platz_Soll where TA06_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' group by TA06_FirmaNr, TA05_Kd_AufNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat ) p pivot ( sum(cnt) for AufStat in ([0],[1],[2],[3],[9]) ) as pvt group by TA06_FirmaNr, TA05_Kd_AufNr,T908_Gruppe ) as t ) p pivot (Sum(Prz) for Gruppe in (' + @Colspvt + ')) as pvt ) as TResult inner join KSAlias.dbo.TA04_Serie on TA04_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA04_Nr = TA05_Kd_AufNr ) as z where TA04_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' _WHEREADD ' exec( @sql) 2SA00TA04_FarbeCellSelect
SC_1.Panel1 Fill 400 25 TA06_PRODTA06TA06_PROD Select TA06_FAD1.*, TA05_Kd_AufNr,TA05_ArtikelNr,TA05_ArtikelBez from KSAlias.dbo.TA06_FAD1 inner join KSAlias.dbo.TA05_FAK1 on TA06_FirmaNr = TA05_FirmaNr and TA06_FA_Nr = TA05_FA_Nr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz on T908_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and T908_Nr = '$PARAM5' and T908_platz = TA06_Platz_Soll where TA06_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and TA05_Kd_AufNr = '$TA04_NR' _WHEREADD TA06_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr TA06_BelegNr = TA06_BelegNr 31101SA00TA06_Auf_Stat
 SC_1.Panel2 Fill 400 TA04_Serie1 TA04_FirmaNr = TA04_FirmaNr TA04_Nr = TA04_Nr

T951_ZG_xml.rpt T951ZG
Select TA51FA.* ,T910_Name,T910_Vorname,T910_name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as FName ,T910_BeschArt ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_T951ZG('G_COMPNR','_DATE_VON','_DAT_BIS1') as TA51FA inner join _TMPTABLE on _TMPTABLE_Num1 = TA51_PersNr and _TMPTABLE_User = 'G_USERID' inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_Firmanr = TA51_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA51_PersNr and T910_FABuch = 1 inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA51_FirmaNr T900_DG1K800_1 1

T940T951ZASum_xml.rpt T940T951
T925 select ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_T940T951ZAKSumPrz','G_LANG') as PRTHead ,D940_FirmaNr as T940_FirmaNr,D940_Jahr as Jahr,D940_PerioType as PerioType,D940_Periode as Periode,D940_BeschArt as T911_Nr,D940_Zeitart as T925_Nr ,D940_BeschBez as T911_Bez,D940_ZeitartBez as T925_Bez,D940_ZATyp as T926_Typ , D940_AbwPrz as Value , D940_Tag as Tag , D940_TagAnwGes as TagAnwGes ,D940_AnzRec as AnzRec ,D940_AnzMa as AnzMA ,D940_TagGes as TagGes --!!! extra ,D940_MW as MW ,D940_AbwPrz as AbwPrz ,D940_MWPrz as MwPrz ,D940_AbwPrzJahr as AbwPrzJahr ,D940_TagAnwPer as TagAnwPer ,T901_Logo from KSAlias.dbo.D940_Abw inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = D940_FirmaNr and D940_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and D940_Jahr = $DATEJAHR and D940_ZATyp in ('G') and D940_Beschart not in ('x') and D940_Zeitart not in ('400103') T900_DG1K800_YY

T940T951ZASum_xml.rpt T940T951
T925 select ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_T940T951ZAKSum','G_LANG') as PRTHead ,D940_FirmaNr as T940_FirmaNr,D940_Jahr as Jahr,D940_PerioType as PerioType ,D940_Periode as Periode,D940_BeschArt as T911_Nr,D940_Zeitart as T925_Nr ,D940_BeschBez as T911_Bez,D940_ZeitartBez as T925_Bez,D940_ZATyp as T926_Typ , cast(D940_Tag as float) as Value , cast(D940_Tag as float) as Tag , D940_TagAnwGes as TagAnwGes ,D940_AnzRec as AnzRec ,D940_AnzMa as AnzMA ,D940_TagGes as TagGes --!!! extra ,D940_MW as MW ,D940_AbwPrz as AbwPrz ,D940_MWPrz as MwPrz ,D940_AbwPrzJahr as AbwPrzJahr ,D940_TagAnwPer as TagAnwPer ,T901_Logo from KSAlias.dbo.D940_Abw inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = D940_FirmaNr and D940_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and D940_Jahr = $DATEJAHR and D940_ZATyp in ('G') T900_DG1K800_YY

TA51_UA60_xml.rpt TA51UA60
Select * ,T910_Name ,T910_Vorname,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as PName ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA51UA60 ('G_COMPNR','$DATE_VON','$DAT_BIS1') inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA51_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA51_PersNr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA51_FirmaNr T900_DG1K800_1NOC 1

REP_TA51_TRAbw_xml.rpt TA51SollMeDiff

declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) declare @ServerSid varchar(40) declare @xdate varchar(10) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @ServerSid = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'Server_SID') -- set @xdate = convert(varchar(10),dateadd(day,-15, current_timestamp),104) set @xdate = '$DACP_Datum' Select ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('Prt_' + a.DACP_Typ,'G_LANG') as TypBez ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('Prt_DACPGK','G_LANG') as Prt_Header , a.* ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53CPVP(@FirmaNr, @ServerSid,@xdate) as a inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = DACP_FirmaNr and DACP_Typ not in ('T999') DACPV_CockpitWerk declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) declare @ServerSid varchar(40) declare @xdate varchar(10) -- set @xdate = convert(varchar(10),dateadd(day,-15, current_timestamp),104) set @xdate = '$DACP_Datum' set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @ServerSid = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'Server_SID') Select ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('Prt_' + a.DACP_Typ,'G_LANG') as TypBez , a.* ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53CPVP(@FirmaNr, @ServerSid,@xdate) as a inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = DACP_FirmaNr and DACP_Typ in ('T999') DACP 0 0

DA80_P4_xml.rpt DA80_Firma
exec ksmaster.dbo.kspr_DA80 'G_COMPNR','G_SESSIONID','','$PerTagVon','$PerTagBis','$PerKWVon','$PerKWBis','$PerMMVon','$PerMMBis','$PerQVon','$PerQBis','$PerYYVon','$PerYYBis' declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$DA80_Nr' set @Platz ='' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' SELECT DA80_FirmaNR ,DA80_Sid,DA80_PerioType,DA80_Nr,DA80_Schicht,DA80_PerioId ,DA80_KnzBasis ,DA80_Pktel,DA80_ZielerfMW ,DA80_KnzZiel ,DA80_TL,DA80_TL_Slope,DA80_TL_OffSet ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_DA80_P4','G_LANG') as PRTHead ,T999_Nr,T999_Bez,T901_Logo from DA80_Firma inner join T999_Werk on T999_FirmaNr = DA80_FirmaNr and T999_Nr = DA80_Nr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = DA80_FirmaNr where DA80_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and DA80_Nr like @Platz and DA80_SID = 'G_SESSIONID' and DA80_Schicht = 0 and DA80_PerioType not in ('Q') 1

K001_TA53GKMZEvdp_xml.rpt TA53_GKVD
declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') Select TA53.* ,T905_Bez ,T910_Name,T910_Vorname,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as PName ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53PersP('G_COMPNR' ,@PerioId) as TA53 inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA53_PersNr inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr 1

K001_TA53GKMZE_xml.rpt TA53_GK
-- Periode, alle Pltze in einer Zeile declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select TA53_Firmanr -- ,TA61_PerioId as TA53_PerioId -- ,TA61_Kst as TA53_Platz,TA61_Schicht as TA53_Schicht ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53GKMZEvd','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_Sch ,0 as TA61_PersNr ,0 as TA53_PersNr ,t.* ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez ,S935_Nr,S935_Bez ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53Platz('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) as t inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA53_Schicht inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_Platz like @Platz and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht 1

K001_TA53GKMP_xml.rpt TA53_GK
declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select TA53_GK .* ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert02 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz2 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert03 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz3 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert04 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz4 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert05 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz5 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert06 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz6 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert07 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz7 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert08 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz8 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert09 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz9 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert10 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz10 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert11 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz11 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert12 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz12 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert13 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz13 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert14 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz14 ,case when TA53_t_Ist > 0 then TA53_wert15 / TA53_t_Ist * 100 else 0 end as GKPrz15 ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez,S935_Nr,S935_Bez,T901_Logo , T910_Name, T910_Vorname, T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as PName from TA53_GK inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and K001_TA53GKMZE_xml.rpt TA53_GK
declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select TA53_Firmanr,TA53_Platz ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53GKMZE','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_Sch ,TA53_Schicht ,TA53_PersNr ,TA53_Datum,TA53_Perioid,TA53_KW,TA53_t_Ist,TA53_t_GKSum ,TA53_Wert01,TA53_Wert02,TA53_Wert03,TA53_Wert04,TA53_Wert05 ,TA53_Wert06,TA53_Wert07,TA53_Wert08,TA53_Wert09,TA53_Wert10 ,TA53_Wert11,TA53_Wert12,TA53_Wert13,TA53_Wert14,TA53_Wert15 ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez,S935_Nr,S935_Bez,T901_Logo ,TA61_Pkte,TA61_t_ist,TA61_Pktel , TA61_KnzZiel * TA61_t_ist as CPktel , TA61_KnzZiel,TA61_KnzBasis ,case when TA61_KnzZiel-TA61_KnzBasis <> 0 then (TA61_Pktel - TA61_KnzBasis) / (TA61_KnzZiel-TA61_KnzBasis) * 100 else 0 end as ZielErf from TA53_GK inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA53_Schicht inner join TA61_Prodsum on TA61_Firmanr = TA53_FirmaNr and TA61_Kst = TA53_Platz and TA61_Schicht = TA53_Schicht and TA61_PersNr = TA53_persNr and TA61_Datum = TA53_Datum and TA61_Inaktiv=0 inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and TA53_PerioId like @PerioId and TA53_Platz like @Platz and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht and TA53_Persnr >0 1

declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select TA53_Firmanr,TA53_Platz ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53GKMZEP','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T910_Nr','DEU') as Prt_Sch ,TA53_PersNr as TA53_Schicht ,TA53_PersNr ,TA53_Datum,TA53_Perioid,TA53_KW,TA53_t_Ist,TA53_t_GKSum ,TA53_Wert01,TA53_Wert02,TA53_Wert03,TA53_Wert04,TA53_Wert05 ,TA53_Wert06,TA53_Wert07,TA53_Wert08,TA53_Wert09,TA53_Wert10 ,TA53_Wert11,TA53_Wert12,TA53_Wert13,TA53_Wert14,TA53_Wert15 ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez ,T910_Nr as S935_Nr, T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as S935_Bez ,T901_Logo ,TA61_Pkte,TA61_t_ist,TA61_Pktel , TA61_KnzZiel * TA61_t_ist as CPktel , TA61_KnzZiel,TA61_KnzBasis ,case when TA61_KnzZiel-TA61_KnzBasis <> 0 then (TA61_Pktel - TA61_KnzBasis) / (TA61_KnzZiel-TA61_KnzBasis) * 100 else 0 end as ZielErf from TA53_GK inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join TA61_Prodsum on TA61_Firmanr = TA53_FirmaNr and TA61_Kst = TA53_Platz and TA61_Schicht = TA53_Schicht and TA61_PersNr = TA53_persNr and TA61_Datum = TA53_Datum and TA61_Inaktiv = 0 inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA61_PersNr and TA61_Schicht = 0 inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and TA53_PerioId like @PerioId and TA53_Platz like @Platz 1

TA61_Datum;TA61_KST;TA61_PersNR;TA61_Schicht SELECT * from _TMPTABLE inner join TA61_ProdSum on _TMPTABLE_Date1 = TA61_Datum and _TMPTABLE_Text2 = TA61_Kst and _TMPTABLE_Num3 = TA61_PersNr and _TMPTABLE_Num4 = TA61_Schicht inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join TA67_EFGLabel on TA67_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TA67_Kst = TA61_Kst inner join TB61_GW on TB61_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TB61_Platz = TA61_Kst where TA61_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' order by _TMPTABLE_ID 1

K001_TA70DetailPers_xml.rpt TA70_PraemieErg
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$TA70_Kst' set @PersNr = ' $TA70_PersNr' set @PerioId = '$TA70_PERIODE' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' if Ltrim(@PersNr) = '0' set @PersNr = '%' if LTRIM(@PersNr)='>0' set @PersNr= '%' Select a.* ,CCPktelk / 100 as TA70_IstKn ,T910_Personalliste.* ,T901_Logo from (Select TA70_FirmaNr,TA70_Periode,TA70_PersNr ,cast(TA70_PersNr as varchar) as TA70_Gruppe ,0 as TA70_Pktl --,0 as TA70_IstKn ,sum(TA70_Sum) as TA70_Sum ,sum(TA70_t_ist) as TA70_t_ist ,sum(TA70_PraeMin) as TA70_PraeMin ,case when sum(TA70_PraeBetrag) <0 then 0 else sum(TA70_PraeBetrag) end as TA70_PraeBetrag ,'' as T903_Bez from TA70_PraemieErg where TA70_FirmaNr = @FirmaNr and TA70_PersNr like @PersNr and TA70_Periode like @PerioId group by TA70_FirmaNr,TA70_Periode,TA70_PersNr ) as a inner join ( Select TA61_FirmaNr,Ta61_PersNr,TA61_PerioId,CCpktelk from ( select Ta61_FirmaNr,TA61_Persnr ,TA61_PerioId ,LAST_VALUE(CCPktelk) over (Partition by TA61_FirmaNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PersNr order by TA61_FirmaNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PersNr) as CCPktelk from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA61EFGVd(@FirmaNr,@PerioId ,'') where TA61_Schicht = 0 ) as TA61Vd group by TA61_FirmaNr,Ta61_PersNr,TA61_PerioId,CCpktelk ) as TA61ZK on TA61_FirmaNr = TA70_FirmaNr and TA61_Persnr = TA70_PersNr and TA61_PerioId = TA70_Periode inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNR = TA70_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA70_PersNr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA70_FirmaNr 1

K001_TA70DetailPers_xml.rpt TA70_PraemieErg
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$TA70_Kst' set @PersNr = ' $TA70_PersNr' set @PerioId = '$TA70_PERIODE' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' if Ltrim(@PersNr) = '0' set @PersNr = '%' if LTRIM(@PersNr)='>0' set @PersNr= '%' Select TA70_FirmaNr,TA70_Periode,TA70_PersNr,TA70_Gruppe,TA70_Pktl,TA70_Sum,TA70_t_ist,TA70_PraeMin,TA70_Typ --,case when CCPktelk <0 then 0 else TA70_PraeBetrag end as TA70_PraeBetrag ,case when TA70_PraeBetrag <0 then 0 else TA70_PraeBetrag end as TA70_PraeBetrag ,T903_Bez ,case when TA70_Typ = 0 then 0 else CCPktelk / 100 end as TA70_IstKn ,T910_Personalliste.* ,T901_Logo from (Select TA70_FirmaNr,TA70_Periode,TA70_PersNr ,cast(TA70_PersNr as varchar) as TA70_Gruppe ,0 as TA70_Pktl --,0 as TA70_IstKn ,sum(TA70_Sum) as TA70_Sum ,sum(TA70_t_ist) as TA70_t_ist ,sum(TA70_PraeMin) as TA70_PraeMin --,case when sum(TA70_PraeBetrag) <0 then 0 else sum(TA70_PraeBetrag) end as TA70_PraeBetrag ,sum(TA70_PraeBetrag) as TA70_PraeBetrag ,min(TA70_Typ) as TA70_TYp ,'' as T903_Bez from TA70_PraemieErg where TA70_FirmaNr = @FirmaNr and TA70_PersNr like @PersNr and TA70_Periode like @PerioId group by TA70_FirmaNr,TA70_Periode,TA70_PersNr ) as a inner join ( Select TA61_FirmaNr,Ta61_PersNr,TA61_PerioId,CCpktelk from ( select Ta61_FirmaNr,TA61_Persnr ,TA61_PerioId ,$LASTVALUE(CCPktelk) over (Partition by TA61_FirmaNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PersNr order by TA61_FirmaNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PersNr) as CCPktelk from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA61EFGVd(@FirmaNr,@PerioId ,'') where TA61_Schicht = 0 ) as TA61Vd group by TA61_FirmaNr,Ta61_PersNr,TA61_PerioId,CCpktelk ) as TA61ZK on TA61_FirmaNr = TA70_FirmaNr and TA61_Persnr = TA70_PersNr and TA61_PerioId = TA70_Periode inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNR = TA70_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA70_PersNr and T910_Entlohnung = 'akk' inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA70_FirmaNr 1

Rep_K001_TA61KnVd_xml.rpt TA61_ProdSum
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$TA61_Kst' set @PersNr = $TA61_PersNr set @Schicht = '$TA61_SCHICHT' set @PerioId = '$TA61_PERIOID' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') set @PrtKn ='' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA61KnPNrVd','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T910_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSchIn ,cast(TA61_PersNr as varchar ) as GWNr ,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as GwBez ,cast(ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue('G_COMPNR','TA53Karenz') as int) as Karenz ,TA61EFG.*,T901_Firma.* into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA61EFGVd(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PrtKn) as TA61EFG inner join KSAlias.dbo.T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA61_PersNr and T910_Entlohnung ='akk' inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum update #tmpTA61 set TA61_KnzZiel = case when (Select Top 1 Last_Value(CCPktelk ) over (order by b.TA61_Datum desc) from #tmpTA61 as b where b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.TA61_Schicht = a. TA61_Schicht and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PerioId = a.TA61_Perioid and b.CCPktelk <>0 ) <>0 then (Select Top 1 Last_Value(TA61_KnzBasis) over (order by b.TA61_Datum desc) from #tmpTA61 as b where b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.TA61_Schicht = a. TA61_Schicht and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PerioId = a.TA61_Perioid and b.TA61_KnzBasis <>0 ) + (( (Select Top 1 Last_Value(TA61_Pktelk ) over (order by b.TA61_Datum desc) from #tmpTA61 as b where b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.TA61_Schicht = a. TA61_Schicht and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PerioId = a.TA61_Perioid and b.TA61_Pktelk <>0 ) - (Select Top 1 Last_Value(TA61_KnzBasis) over (order by b.TA61_Datum desc) from #tmpTA61 as b where b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.TA61_Schicht = a. TA61_Schicht and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PerioId = a.TA61_Perioid and b.TA61_KnzBasis <>0 )) / ( (Select Top 1 Last_Value(CCPktelk ) over (order by b.TA61_Datum desc) from #tmpTA61 as b where b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.TA61_Schicht = a. TA61_Schicht and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PerioId = a.TA61_Perioid and b.CCPktelk <>0 ) / 100 )) else 1 end ,TA61_KnzBasis =(Select Top 1 Last_Value(TA61_KnzBasis) over (order by b.TA61_Datum desc) from #tmpTA61 as b where b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.TA61_Schicht = a. TA61_Schicht and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PerioId = a.TA61_Perioid and b.TA61_KnzBasis <>0 ) from #tmpTA61 as a select * from #tmpTA61 where TA61_PersNr <> 0 and TA61_Schicht= 0 order by TA61_Kst,GwNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61_SumVM declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_KN') set @PrtKn ='' Select * from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_TA61SumVMSzallEFGVd('G_COMPNR','$TA61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$TA61_Kst' set @PersNr = $TA61_PersNr set @Schicht = '$TA61_SCHICHT' set @PerioId = '$TA61_PERIOID' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_SZ') if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA61LeistKn','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T910_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSchIn ,cast(TA61_PersNr as varchar ) as GWNr ,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as GwBez ,TA61EFG.*,T905_ArbMasch.*,T904_Kostenstellen.*,T901_Firma.* --,TB61.* into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA61EFG(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PrtKn) as TA61EFG inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht inner join KSAlias.dbo.T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA61_PersNr and ((T905_Nr not in ('0250') and T910_Entlohnung='akk') or (T905_Nr in ('0250') ) ) --inner join ( Select * from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TB61GWEFG(@FirmaNr) ) as TB61 on TB61FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TB61Platz= TA61_Kst and TB61PerioId = TA61_PerioId order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum select * from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_Kst as Kst,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as Perioid,sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) as w from #tmpTA61 group by TA61_Kst,GWNr,TA61_PerioId having not sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) = 0 ) as T on TA61_Kst = Kst and GwNr = GW and TA61_Perioid = PerioId where TA61_Kst like @Platz and TA61_PersNr <> 0 and TA61_Schicht= 0 order by TA61_Kst,GwNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61Sz_SumVMSzPr declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_SZ') Select * from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_TA61SumVMSzEFG('G_COMPNR','$TA61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TB61GWEFG(@FirmaNr) ) as TB61 on TB61FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TB61Platz= TA61_Kst and TB61PerioId = TA61_PerioId order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum Select * + sum(TA61_Wert1) = 0 ) as T on TA61_Kst = Kst and GwNr = GW and TA61_Perioid = PerioId where TA61_Kst like @Platz and not TA61_PersNr = 0 and TA61_Schicht =0 order by K001_TA53GKMZE_xml.rpt TA53_GK
-- Periode, alle Pltze in einer Zeile declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select TA53_Firmanr -- ,TA61_PerioId as TA53_PerioId -- ,TA61_Kst as TA53_Platz,TA61_Schicht as TA53_Schicht ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53GKMZEvd','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_Sch ,0 as TA61_PersNr ,0 as TA53_PersNr ,t.* ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez ,S935_Nr,S935_Bez ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53Platz('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) as t inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA53_Schicht inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_Platz like @Platz and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht 1

K001_TA53GKMZE_xml.rpt TA53_GKMZE
-- je Seite Platz- alle Personen am Platz declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53GKMZEP','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T910_Nr','DEU') as Prt_Sch ,TA53_PersNr as TA53_Schicht ,TA53_PerioId as TA53_PerioId -- ,TA61_Kst as TA53_Platz ,t.* ,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez ,T910_Nr as S935_Nr, T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as S935_Bez ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53PlatzPers('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) as t inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA53_PersNr and TA53_Schicht = 0 inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA53_Schicht inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_Platz like @Platz and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht 1

K001_TA53GKMZEvdp_xml.rpt TA53_GKVD
-- je Platz alle Personen darin declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') Select TA53.* ,TA61_Kst as TA53_Platz ,TA61_PerioId as TA53_PerioId ,T910_Nr as TA53_PersNr ,T905_Bez ,T910_Name,T910_Vorname,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as PName ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53PersP('G_COMPNR' ,@PerioId) as TA53 inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA53_PersNr and TA53_Schicht = 0 inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr 1

K001_TA53GKMZEvd_xml.rpt TA53_GKVD
-- alle Personen verdichtet in der Periode declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') Select TA53.* ,T910_Name,T910_Vorname,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as PName ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53Pers('G_COMPNR' ,@PerioId) as TA53 inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA53_PersNr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr order by TA53_PersNr 1

T951_ZG_xml.rpt T951ZG
declare @DVon datetime declare @DBis datetime set @DVOn =ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_GetDatefromPeriode('$PerioId') set @DBis = dateadd(day,-1,dateadd(month,1,@dvon)) Select TA51FA.* ,T910_Name,T910_Vorname,T910_name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as FName ,T910_Entlohnung as T910_BeschArt ,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_T951ZG('G_COMPNR',@DVon,@DBis) as TA51FA inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_Firmanr = TA51_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA51_PersNr and T910_FABuch = 1 inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA51_FirmaNr 1

Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert07)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP07 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert08)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP08 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert09)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP09 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert10)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP10 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert11)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP11 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert12)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP12 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert13)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP13 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert14)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP14 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert15)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP15 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_t_GKSum)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WPGes ,Sum(TA53_t_Ist / 60 ) as t_ist_h ,Sum(TA53_t_GKSum / 60) as t_GKSum_h from TA53_GK group by TA53_FirmaNr,TA53_PerioId,TA53_Platz,TA53_Schicht ) as a on a.TA53_FirmaNr = t.TA53_FirmaNr and a.TA53_Platz = t.TA53_Platz and a.TA53_Schicht = t.TA53_Schicht and a.BasePerioid = t.TA53_PerioId where a.TA53_FirmaNr = 'TE' 1

Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('S935_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSchIn ,TeamSchKn as GWNr ,S935_Bez as GwBez ,TA61_Wert1 + TA61_Wert6 + TA61_Wert11 as Stk_FA -- Gesamt Anzahl FA ,TA61_Wert2 + TA61_Wert7 + TA61_Wert12 as t_FA -- Gesamtzeit FA ,TA61_Wert4 + TA61_Wert9 + TA61_Wert14 as Stk_RV -- Gesamtdauer Rsten ,TA61_Wert5 + TA61_Wert10 + TA61_Wert15 as t_RV -- Gesamtdauer Rsten ,TA61_t_ist - ((TA61_Wert2 + TA61_Wert7 + TA61_Wert12) + (TA61_Wert5 + TA61_Wert10 + TA61_Wert15)) as t_NZ -- Nebenzeiten ,case when TA61_t_ist <>0 then Round((TA61_Wert2 + TA61_Wert7 + TA61_Wert12) / TA61_t_ist * 100,0) else 0 end as Prz_FA ,case when TA61_t_ist <>0 then Round((TA61_Wert5 + TA61_Wert10 + TA61_Wert15) / TA61_t_ist * 100,0) else 0 end as Prz_RV -- ,case when TA61_t_ist <>0 then Round((TA61_t_ist - ((TA61_Wert2 + TA61_Wert7 + TA61_Wert12) + (TA61_Wert5 + TA61_Wert10 + TA61_Wert15))) / TA61_t_ist * 100,0) else 0 end -- wegen Rundungsfehler die % der Nebenzeit subtraktiv errechnen ,case when ( ( case when TA61_t_ist <>0 then Round((TA61_Wert2 + TA61_Wert7 + TA61_Wert12) / TA61_t_ist * 100,0) else 0 end + case when TA61_t_ist <>0 then Round((TA61_Wert5 + TA61_Wert10 + TA61_Wert15) / TA61_t_ist * 100,0) else 0 end) ) >0 then 100 - ( case when TA61_t_ist <>0 then Round((TA61_Wert2 + TA61_Wert7 + TA61_Wert12) / TA61_t_ist * 100,0) else 0 end + case when TA61_t_ist <>0 then Round((TA61_Wert5 + TA61_Wert10 + TA61_Wert15) / TA61_t_ist * 100,0) else 0 end) else 0 end as Prz_NZ ,* into #tmpTA61_3 from ( Select * from #tmpTA61_1 union Select * from #tmpTA61_2 ) as T inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr -- inner join ( Select * from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TB61GWEFG(@FirmaNr) ) as TB61 on TB61FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TB61Platz= TA61_Kst and TB61PerioId = TA61_PerioId order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum Select (Select Sum(Prz_FA) from #tmpTA61_3 as b where b.TA61_FirmaNr = a.TA61_FirmaNr and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.GWNr = a.GWNr and b.TA61_PerioId = TA61_PerioId and b.TA61_Datum <= a.TA61_Datum) as Prz_FAk ,(Select Count(Prz_FA) from #tmpTA61_3 as b where b.TA61_FirmaNr = a.TA61_FirmaNr and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.GWNr = a.GWNr and b.TA61_PerioId = TA61_PerioId and b.TA61_Datum <= a.TA61_Datum and Prz_FA <>0) as Prz_FACnt ,(Select Sum(Prz_RV) from #tmpTA61_3 as b where b.TA61_FirmaNr = a.TA61_FirmaNr and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.GWNr = a.GWNr and b.TA61_PerioId = TA61_PerioId and b.TA61_Datum <= a.TA61_Datum) as Prz_RVk ,(Select Count(Prz_RV) from #tmpTA61_3 as b where b.TA61_FirmaNr = a.TA61_FirmaNr and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.GWNr = a.GWNr and b.TA61_PerioId = TA61_PerioId and b.TA61_Datum <= a.TA61_Datum and Prz_RV <>0) as Prz_RVCnt ,(Select Sum(Prz_NZ) from #tmpTA61_3 as b where b.TA61_FirmaNr = a.TA61_FirmaNr and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.GWNr = a.GWNr and b.TA61_PerioId = TA61_PerioId and b.TA61_Datum <= a.TA61_Datum) as Prz_NZk ,(Select Count(Prz_NZ) from #tmpTA61_3 as b where b.TA61_FirmaNr = a.TA61_FirmaNr and b.TA61_Kst = a.TA61_Kst and b.TA61_PersNr = a.TA61_PersNr and b.GWNr = a.GWNr and b.TA61_PerioId = TA61_PerioId and b.TA61_Datum <= a.TA61_Datum and Prz_NZ <>0) as Prz_NZCnt ,cast(0.0 as float) as MWPrzFA ,cast(0.0 as float) as MWPrzRV ,cast(0.0 as float) as MWPrzNZ ,* into #tmpTA61 from #tmpTA61_3 as a update #tmpTA61 set MWPrzFA = MWFA from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_FirmaNr as FirmaNr,TA61_kst as Kst,TA61_PersNr as PersNr,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as PerioId ,Sum(Prz_FA) / count(Prz_FA) as MWFA from #tmpTA61 where Prz_FA <>0 group by TA61_FirmaNr,TA61_kst,TA61_PersNr,GWNr,TA61_PerioId ) as T on TA61_FirmaNr = FirmaNr and TA61_Kst = Kst and TA61_PersNr = PersNr and GWnr = gw and TA61_PerioId = Perioid update #tmpTA61 set MWPrzRV = MWRV from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_FirmaNr as FirmaNr,TA61_kst as Kst,TA61_PersNr as PersNr,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as PerioId ,Sum(Prz_RV) / count(Prz_RV) as MWRV from #tmpTA61 where Prz_RV <>0 group by TA61_FirmaNr,TA61_kst,TA61_PersNr,GWNr,TA61_PerioId ) as T on TA61_FirmaNr = FirmaNr and TA61_Kst = Kst and TA61_PersNr = PersNr and GWnr = gw and TA61_PerioId = Perioid update #tmpTA61 set MWPrzNZ = MWNZ from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_FirmaNr as FirmaNr,TA61_kst as Kst,TA61_PersNr as PersNr,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as PerioId ,Sum(Prz_NZ) / count(Prz_NZ) as MWNZ from #tmpTA61 where Prz_NZ <>0 group by TA61_FirmaNr,TA61_kst,TA61_PersNr,GWNr,TA61_PerioId ) as T on TA61_FirmaNr = FirmaNr and TA61_Kst = Kst and TA61_PersNr = PersNr and GWnr = gw and TA61_PerioId = Perioid select case when Prz_FACnt <> 0 then Prz_Fak / Prz_FACnt else 0 end as MWPrzFAk ,case when Prz_RVCnt <> 0 then Prz_RVk / Prz_RVCnt else 0 end as MWPrzRVk ,case when Prz_NZCnt <> 0 then Prz_NZk / Prz_NZCnt else 0 end as MWPrzNZk ,* from #tmpTA61 where TA61_Kst like @Platz and TA61_Schicht like @Team order by TA61_Kst,GWNR,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61_SumVMAK declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_SZS1') Select * from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_TM61SumVMSzPrEFG('G_COMPNR','$TM61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

K001_TA61SzAll_xml.rpt TA61SzAll
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_SZA') set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$T903_Nr' set @PersNr = $TA61_PersNr set @Schicht = '$TA61_SCHICHT' set @PerioId = '$TA61_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT * into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA61EFG(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PrtKn) inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr and T904_GruppeNr = @Platz inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht --inner join ( Select * from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TB61GWEFG(@FirmaNr) ) as TB61 on TB61FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TB61Platz= TA61_Kst and TB61PerioId = TA61_PerioId order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum select * from #tmpTA61 where TA61_PersNr like @PersNr and TA61_Schicht like @Schicht order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum K001_TA61SzAllVM_xml declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_SZA') Select * from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_TA61SumVMSzPrEFG('G_COMPNR','$TA61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

TA61_xml.rpt TA61_ProdSum
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$TA61_Kst' set @PersNr = $TA61_PersNr set @Schicht = '$TA61_SCHICHT' set @PerioId = '$TA61_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_SZ') begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA61LeistKnPr','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T910_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('T842_Nr','DEU') as Prt_TeamSchIn ,cast(TA61_PersNr as varchar ) as GWNr ,T910_Name + ', ' + T910_Vorname as GwBez ,TA61EFG.*,T905_ArbMasch.*,T904_Kostenstellen.*,T901_Firma.* --,TB61.* into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA61EFGPr(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PrtKn) as TA61EFG inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht inner join KSAlias.dbo.T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = TA61_PersNr --inner join ( Select * from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TB61GWEFG(@FirmaNr) ) as TB61 on TB61FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TB61Platz= TA61_Kst and TB61PerioId = TA61_PerioId order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum select * from #tmpTA61 inner join ( Select TA61_Kst as Kst,GWNr as GW,TA61_PerioId as Perioid,sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) as w from #tmpTA61 group by TA61_Kst,GWNr,TA61_PerioId having not sum(TA61_t_ist) + sum(TA61_Wert1) = 0 ) as T on TA61_Kst = Kst and GwNr = GW and TA61_Perioid = PerioId where TA61_Kst like @Platz and TA61_PersNr <> 0 and TA61_Schicht= 0 order by TA61_Kst,GwNr,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61Sz_SumVMSzPr declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' declare @PrtKn varchar(6) set @PrtKn = ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_T900GetValue(@FirmaNr,'TA61_PrtKn_SZ') Select * from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_TA61SumVMSzPrEFG('G_COMPNR','$TA61_PerioID',@PrtKn) 1

declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @PersNr numeric(10,0) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' set @Platz = '$T903_Nr' set @PersNr = $TA61_PersNr set @Schicht = '$TA61_SCHICHT' set @PerioId = '$TA61_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Schicht = '%' begin try drop table #tmpTA61 end try begin catch print '' end catch SELECT * into #tmpTA61 from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA61EFG(@FirmaNr,@PerioId,@PersNr) inner join KSAlias.dbo.T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join KSAlias.dbo.T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr and T904_GruppeNr=@Platz inner join KSAlias.dbo.T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join KSAlias.dbo.S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and S935_Nr = TA61_Schicht --inner join ( Select * from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TB61GWEFG(@FirmaNr) ) as TB61 on TB61FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TB61Platz= TA61_Kst and TB61PerioId = TA61_PerioId order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum select * from #tmpTA61 where TA61_Schicht like @Schicht order by TA61_Kst,TA61_Schicht,TA61_PerioId,TA61_Datum TA61_SumVM Select * from KSMaster.dbo.kstf_TA61SumVMSzallEFG('G_COMPNR','$TA61_PerioID') 1

TA61_Datum;TA61_Kst;TA61_PersNr;TA61_Schicht SELECT * from _TMPTABLE inner join TA61_ProdSum on _TMPTABLE_Date1 = TA61_Datum and _TMPTABLE_Text2 = TA61_Kst and _TMPTABLE_Num3 = TA61_PersNr and _TMPTABLE_Num4 = TA61_Schicht inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_firmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA61_FirmaNr inner join TA67_EFGLabel on TA67_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TA67_Kst = TA61_Kst where TA61_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' order by _TMPTABLE_ID 1

K001_TA53GK_xml.rpt TA53_GK
declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53Team','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('TA42_Team','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,cast(TA53_Schicht as varchar ) as GWNr ,T842_Bez as GwBez ,TA53.*,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez,'' as S935_Nr,'' as S935_Bez,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53Team('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) as TA53 inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join T842_Team on T842_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T842_Nr = TA53_Schicht inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_Platz like @Platz and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht and TA53_PerioId like @PerioId TA53_SumVMGK declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' Select * from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53SumVMTeam('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) 1

K001_TA53GK_xml.rpt TA53_GK
declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' set @Platz = replace(@Platz,'*','%') set @PerioId = replace(@PerioId,'*','%') set @Schicht = replace(@Schicht,'*','%') Select ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('PRT_TA53TeamG','DEU') as Prt_HeadLine ,ksmaster.dbo.ksfc_S903GetText('TA42_Team','DEU') as Prt_TeamSch ,cast(TA53_Schicht as varchar ) as GWNr ,T842_Bez as GwBez ,TA53.*,T905_Nr,T905_Bez,T904_Nr,T904_Bez,'' as S935_Nr,'' as S935_Bez,T901_Logo from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53Team('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) as TA53 inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = TA53_Platz inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and T904_Nr = T905_KstNr inner join T842_Team on T842_FirmaNr = TA53_FirmaNr and T842_Nr = TA53_Schicht inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_Platz like @Platz and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht and TA53_PerioId like @PerioId TA53_SumVMGK declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @Platz = '$TA53_Platz' set @Schicht = '$TA53_SCHICHT' set @PersNr = '$TA53_PERSNR' set @PerioId = '$TA53_PERIOID' if @Platz = '' set @Platz = '%' if @Schicht = '' set @Schicht = '%' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @PerioId = '' set @PerioId = '%' Select * from ksmaster.dbo.kstf_TA53SumVMTeamG('G_COMPNR',@PerioId) 1

REP_TA61PKI.rpt TA61PKI
Select T905_Nr,T905_Bez,ta66_efg from T905_ArbMasch inner join TA66_EFG_Kst on TA66_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and TA66_ArbMasch = T905_nr T905_Nr;TA66_EFG T905_PKI Select * ,case when TA66_Spalte = 1 then TA61_Wert1 when TA66_Spalte = 2 then TA61_Wert2 when TA66_Spalte = 3 then TA61_Wert3 when TA66_Spalte = 4 then TA61_Wert4 when TA66_Spalte = 5 then TA61_Wert5 when TA66_Spalte = 6 then TA61_Wert6 when TA66_Spalte = 7 then TA61_Wert7 when TA66_Spalte = 8 then TA61_Wert8 when TA66_Spalte = 9 then TA61_Wert9 when TA66_Spalte = 10 then TA61_Wert10 when TA66_Spalte = 11 then TA61_Wert11 when TA66_Spalte = 12 then TA61_Wert12 when TA66_Spalte = 13 then TA61_Wert13 when TA66_Spalte = 14 then TA61_Wert14 when TA66_Spalte = 15 then TA61_Wert15 else 0 end as PKIEFG_Wert , Case when TA61_t_Ist >0 then case when TA66_Spalte = 1 then TA61_Wert1 when TA66_Spalte = 2 then TA61_Wert2 when TA66_Spalte = 3 then TA61_Wert3 when TA66_Spalte = 4 then TA61_Wert4 when TA66_Spalte = 5 then TA61_Wert5 when TA66_Spalte = 6 then TA61_Wert6 when TA66_Spalte = 7 then TA61_Wert7 when TA66_Spalte = 8 then TA61_Wert8 when TA66_Spalte = 9 then TA61_Wert9 when TA66_Spalte = 10 then TA61_Wert10 when TA66_Spalte = 11 then TA61_Wert11 when TA66_Spalte = 12 then TA61_Wert12 when TA66_Spalte = 13 then TA61_Wert13 when TA66_Spalte = 14 then TA61_Wert14 when TA66_Spalte = 15 then TA61_Wert15 else 0 end /(TA61_t_Ist / 60) else 0 end as PKIWert , case when TA66_Spalte = 1 then TA67_EFG1 when TA66_Spalte = 2 then TA67_EFG2 when TA66_Spalte = 3 then TA67_EFG3 when TA66_Spalte = 4 then TA67_EFG4 when TA66_Spalte = 5 then TA67_EFG5 when TA66_Spalte = 6 then TA67_EFG6 when TA66_Spalte = 7 then TA67_EFG7 when TA66_Spalte = 8 then TA67_EFG8 when TA66_Spalte = 9 then TA67_EFG9 when TA66_Spalte = 10 then TA67_EFG10 when TA66_Spalte = 11 then TA67_EFG11 when TA66_Spalte = 12 then TA67_EFG12 when TA66_Spalte = 13 then TA67_EFG13 when TA66_Spalte = 14 then TA67_EFG14 when TA66_Spalte = 15 then TA67_EFG15 else '' end as PKIEFG from _TMPTABLE inner join TA61_ProdSum on TA61_Kst = _TMPTABLE_Text1 and TA61_FirmaNR = 'G_COMPNR' and TA61_PerioId ='_DATEJAHR_DATEMONAT' and TA61_PersNr = 0 inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNR and T905_Nr = TA61_Kst inner join T901_Firma on T901_NR = TA61_FirmaNR inner join TA66_EFG_Kst on TA66_FirmaNr = T905_FirmaNr and TA66_ArbMasch = T905_nr and TA66_EFG = _TMPTABLE_Text2 inner join TA67_EFGLabel on TA67_FirmaNr = TA61_FirmaNr and TA67_Kst = TA61_Kst where TA61_PerioId ='_DATEJAHR_DATEMONAT' T900_DG1K800_YYMM 0

SC_Main.Panel1 Left 400 TA04_PROD3TA04_PROD3TA04_PROD3 declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) declare @GrpProd varchar(10) set @GrpProd = '$PARAM5' SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + '] as ' + T908_Gruppe , ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + '] as ' + T908_Gruppe ) FROM KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' , ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' ) FROM KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe set @sql=' Select * from ( Select *, dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_StartTermin) as KWStart,dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_EndTermin) as KWEnd from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr ,' + @cols + ' from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe as Gruppe ,cast((t.S3 + t.S9)/(t.S0 + t.S1 + t.S2+t.S3+t.S9 ) * 100 as int) as Prz from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe ,case when Sum([0]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([0]) as float) end as S0 ,case when Sum([1]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([1]) as float) end as S1 ,case when Sum([2]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([2]) as float) end as S2 ,case when Sum([3]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([3]) as float) end as S3 ,case when Sum([9]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([9]) as float) end as S9 from (Select TA06_FirmaNr ,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat as AufStat,sum(TA06_Ist_Me) as IstMe, COUNT(TA06_BelegNr) as Cnt from KSAlias.dbo.TA06_FAD1 inner join KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz on T908_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and T908_Nr = ''' + @GrpProd + ''' and T908_platz = TA06_Platz_Soll where TA06_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' group by TA06_FirmaNr, TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat ) p pivot ( sum(cnt) for AufStat in ([0],[1],[2],[3],[9]) ) as pvt group by TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe ) as t ) p pivot (Sum(Prz) for Gruppe in (' + @Colspvt + ')) as pvt ) as TResult inner join KSAlias.dbo.TA04_Serie on TA04_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA04_Nr = TA06_ErpNr ) as z where TA04_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' _WHEREADD ' exec( @sql) 2SA00TA04_FarbeCellSelect

TA53_FirmaNr where TA53_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and TA53_PerioId like @PerioId and TA53_Schicht like @Schicht TA53_SumVMGK declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @Schicht ,TA53_Platz,TA53_Schicht,0 as VM ,Convert(Varchar(6),dateadd(month,0,cast('01.'+ substring(TA53_PerioId,5,2) + '.' + substring(TA53_PerioId,1,4) as datetime)),112) as BasePerioId , Sum(TA53_t_ist) as t_ist , Sum(TA53_t_GKSum) as t_GKSum , Sum(TA53_Wert01) as Wert1 , Sum(TA53_Wert02) as Wert2 , Sum(TA53_Wert03) as Wert3 , Sum(TA53_Wert04) as Wert4 , Sum(TA53_Wert05) as Wert5 , Sum(TA53_Wert06) as Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert03)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP03 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert04)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP04 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) ,Sum(TA53_t_GKSum / 60) as t_GKSum_h from TA53_GK group by TA53_FirmaNr,TA53_PerioId,TA53_Platz ,TA53_Schicht union select TA53_FirmaNr,TA53_PerioId,TA53_Platz,TA53_Schicht,-2 as VM ,Convert(Varchar(6),dateadd(month,+2,cast('01.'+ substring(TA53_PerioId,5,2) + '.' + substring(TA53_PerioId,1,4) as datetime)),112) as BasePerioId , Sum(TA53_t_ist) as t_ist , Sum(TA53_t_GKSum) as t_GKSum , Sum(TA53_Wert01) as Wert1 , Sum(TA53_Wert02) as Wert2 , Sum(TA53_Wert03) as Wert3 , Sum(TA53_Wert04) as Wert4 , Sum(TA53_Wert05) as Wert5 , Sum(TA53_Wert06) as Wert6 , Sum(TA53_Wert07) as Wert7 , Sum(TA53_Wert08) as Wert8 , Sum(TA53_Wert09) as Wert9 , Sum(TA53_Wert10) as Wert10 , Sum(TA53_Wert11) as Wert11 , Sum(TA53_Wert12) as Wert12 , Sum(TA53_Wert13) as Wert13 , Sum(TA53_Wert14) as Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert07)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP07 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert08)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP08 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert09)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP09 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert10)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP10 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert11)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP11 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert12)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP12 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_Wert15)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WP15 , case when Sum(TA53_t_ist) >0 then Sum(TA53_t_GKSum)/Sum(TA53_t_ist)*100 else 0 end as WPGes ,Sum(TA53_t_Ist / 60 ) as t_ist_h ,Sum(TA53_t_GKSum / 60) as t_GKSum_h from TA53_GK group by TA53_FirmaNr,TA53_PerioId,TA53_Platz,TA53_Schicht ) as a on a.TA53_FirmaNr = t.TA53_FirmaNr and a.TA53_Platz = t.TA53_Platz and T817_EATag_xml.rpt T817_EATag
declare @FirmaNr varchar(2) declare @PersNr varchar(10) declare @Platz varchar(20) declare @EAKn varchar(20) declare @PerioId varchar(6) set @PersNr = '$T817_PERSNR' set @Platz = '$T817_NR' set @EAKn = '$T817_EAKN' set @PerioId = '$T817_PERIOID' if @PersNr = '' set @PersNr = '%' if @Platz= '' set @Platz = '%' if @EAKn= '' set @EAKn = '%' if @PerioId= '' set @PerioId = '%' Select T817_EATag.* , T910_Name,T910_Vorname,T905_Bez,T905_KstNr, T901_Logo from T817_EATag inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr= T817_FirmaNr and T910_Nr = T817_PersNr inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = T817_FirmaNr and T905_Nr = T817_Nr inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = T817_FirmaNr where T817_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T817_PersNr like @PersNr and T817_Nr like @Platz and T817_EAKn like @EAKn order by T817_PersNr,T817_Nr,T817_EAKn,T817_Datum 1

SC_Main.Panel1 Left 400 TA04_PRODTA04_PRODTA04_PROD declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) declare @GrpProd varchar(10) set @GrpProd = '$PARAM5' SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + '] as ' + T908_Gruppe , ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + '] as ' + T908_Gruppe ) FROM KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' , ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' ) FROM KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe set @sql=' Select * from ( Select *, dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_StartTermin) as KWStart,dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_EndTermin) as KWEnd from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr ,' + @cols + ' from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe as Gruppe ,cast((t.S3 + t.S9)/(t.S0 + t.S1 + t.S2+t.S3+t.S9 ) * 100 as int) as Prz from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe ,case when Sum([0]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([0]) as float) end as S0 ,case when Sum([1]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([1]) as float) end as S1 ,case when Sum([2]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([2]) as float) end as S2 ,case when Sum([3]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([3]) as float) end as S3 ,case when Sum([9]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([9]) as float) end as S9 from (Select TA06_FirmaNr ,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat as AufStat,sum(TA06_Ist_Me) as IstMe, COUNT(TA06_BelegNr) as Cnt from KSAlias.dbo.TA06_FAD1 inner join KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz on T908_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and T908_Nr = ''' + @GrpProd + ''' and T908_platz = TA06_Platz_Soll where TA06_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' group by TA06_FirmaNr, TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat ) p pivot ( sum(cnt) for AufStat in ([0],[1],[2],[3],[9]) ) as pvt group by TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe ) as t ) p pivot (Sum(Prz) for Gruppe in (' + @Colspvt + ')) as pvt ) as TResult inner join KSAlias.dbo.TA04_Serie on TA04_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA04_Nr = TA06_ErpNr ) as z where TA04_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' _WHEREADD ' exec( @sql) 2SA00TA04_FarbeCellSelect

where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' , ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T908_Gruppe) + ']' ) FROM KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz where T908_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T908_NR = @GrpProd group by T908_Gruppe ORDER BY T908_Gruppe set @sql=' Select * from ( Select *, dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_StartTermin) as KWStart,dbo.ksfc_isoweekJahr(TA04_EndTermin) as KWEnd from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr ,' + @cols + ' from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe as Gruppe ,cast((t.S3 + t.S9)/(t.S0 + t.S1 + t.S2+t.S3+t.S9 ) * 100 as int) as Prz from ( Select TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe ,case when Sum([0]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([0]) as float) end as S0 ,case when Sum([1]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([1]) as float) end as S1 ,case when Sum([2]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([2]) as float) end as S2 ,case when Sum([3]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([3]) as float) end as S3 ,case when Sum([9]) is NULL then 0 else cast(Sum([9]) as float) end as S9 from (Select TA06_FirmaNr ,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat as AufStat,sum(TA06_Ist_Me) as IstMe, COUNT(TA06_BelegNr) as Cnt from KSAlias.dbo.TA06_FAD1 inner join KSAlias.dbo.T908_GruppePlatz on T908_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and T908_Nr = ''' + @GrpProd + ''' and T908_platz = TA06_Platz_Soll where TA06_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' group by TA06_FirmaNr, TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe,TA06_Auf_Stat ) p pivot ( sum(cnt) for AufStat in ([0],[1],[2],[3],[9]) ) as pvt group by TA06_FirmaNr,TA06_ErpNr,T908_Gruppe ) as t ) p pivot (Sum(Prz) for Gruppe in (' + @Colspvt + ')) as pvt ) as TResult inner join KSAlias.dbo.TA04_Serie on TA04_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA04_Nr = TA06_ErpNr ) as z where TA04_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' _WHEREADD ' exec( @sql) 2SA00TA04_FarbeCellSelect

ArbIst,T951_PersNr as PersNr , T951_Zeitart as Zeitart,T951_Taetigkeit as Taetigkeit ,Sum(T951_IstZeit) as IstZeit,Sum(T951_Pause) as Pause,Sum(T951_PauseAbw) as PauseAbw from T951_Buchungsdaten where ,T951_PersNr, T951_Zeitart ,T951_Taetigkeit ) as t inner join T910_Personalliste on T910_FirmaNr = t.FirmaNr and T910_Nr = t.Persnr inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = t.FirmaNr and T905_Nr = T904_FirmaNr and T903_Nr = T904_GruppeNr inner join S935_Schichten on S935_FirmaNr = t.FirmaNr and S935_Nr = t.Schicht inner join T901_Firma on T901_Nr = t.FirmaNr where T901_Nr = 'G_COMPNR' and $ZUORDNUNG REP_T951_KST_MAMM_SUM.rpt 1 Select T951_FirmaNr,Periode,T910_Nr,T910_Name,T910_Vorname,Istzeit ,S935_Nr,S935_Bez,S935_Sort from ( Select T951_FirmaNr, CONVERT(varchar(6),T951_tagid,112) as T951_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T951_IstZeit <> 0 and T951_TagId BETWEEN '01._DATEMONAT._DATEJAHR' and '_DATELASTDAYINMONTH' group by T951_FirmaNr,CONVERT(varchar(6),T951_tagid,112) declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),TA20_ArtGr2) + '] as ' + TA20_ArtGr2, ' [' + convert(varchar(10),TA20_ArtGr2) + '] as ' + TA20_ArtGr2) FROM TA20_Artikel where TA20_FirmaNr = 'TE' and TA20_Nr like 'GK%' and TA20_ArtGr2 <>'' group by TA20_ArtGr2 ORDER BY TA20_ArtGr2 SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),TA20_ArtGr2) + ']', ' [' + convert(varchar(10),TA20_ArtGr2) + ']') FROM TA20_Artikel where TA20_FirmaNr = 'TE' and TA20_Nr like 'GK%' and TA20_ArtGr2 <>'' group by TA20_ArtGr2 ORDER BY TA20_ArtGr2 set @sql=' select * from ( select TA51_FirmaNr,TA51_PersNr,TA51_TagId ,TA06_FA_Nr ,' + @cols + ' from ( Select TA51.TA51_FirmaNr,TA51.TA51_PersNr,TA51.TA51_TagId ,TA51.TA06_FA_Nr, TA51.ArtGr2,Sum(Dauer) as Dauer from ( select TA51_FirmaNr,TA51_PersNr,TA51_TagId ,TA06_FA_Nr,TA20_ArtGr2 as ArtGr2,sum(TA51_Dauer) as Dauer from TA51_FABuchung inner join TA06_FAD1 on TA06_FirmaNr=TA51_FirmaNr and TA06_BelegNr = TA51_Belegnr inner join TA21_AuArt on TA21_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and TA21_Nr = TA06_FA_Art and TA21_Typ =3 inner join TA05_FAK1 on TA05_FirmaNr=TA06_FirmaNr and TA05_FA_Nr = TA06_FA_Nr inner join TA20_Artikel on TA20_FirmaNr = TA05_FirmaNr and TA20_Nr = TA05_ArtikelNr group by TA51_FirmaNr,TA51_PersNr,TA51_TagId ,TA06_FA_Nr,TA21_Typ,TA20_ArtGr2 ) TA51 group by TA51_FirmaNr,TA51_PersNr,TA51_TagId ,TA06_FA_Nr,ArtGr2 ) p pivot ( max(Dauer) for ArtGr2 in (' + @Colspvt + ') ) as pvt ) as a ' execute (@sql) T900_DG1K800_1NOC 1

REP_K001_TA40.rpt TA40_Planung_01
SELECT TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_KWPlan, T905_ArbMasch.T905_Bez, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Name, TA40_Vorname, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Schicht, S935_Bez, sum(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 1 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T925_Nr = '010110' ) then 4 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS MO, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 2 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T925_Nr = '010110' ) then 4 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS DI, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum)= 3 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T925_Nr = '010110' ) then 4 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS MI, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 4 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T925_Nr = '010110' ) then 4 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS DO, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 5 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T925_Nr = '010110' ) then 4 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS FR, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 6 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T925_Nr = '010110' ) then 4 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS SA, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 7 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T925_Nr = '010110' ) then 4 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS SO FROM TA40_Planung_01 inner join T940_Kalender on
