SC_Main.Panel1 Top 400 TA20_FUMEVIEW_TA20FUHATA20_FUME declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T905_Nr) + '] as m' + T905_Nr, ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T905_Nr) + '] as m' + T905_Nr) FROM T905_ArbMasch where T905_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T905_NR like '20%' group by T905_Nr ORDER BY T905_Nr SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(10),T905_Nr) + ']', ' [' + convert(varchar(10),T905_Nr) + ']') FROM T905_ArbMasch where T905_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T905_NR like '20%' group by T905_Nr ORDER BY T905_Nr set @sql=' select * from ( select FirmaNr,Periode,TYP ,' + @cols + ' from ( select TA05.T905_Nr as T905Nr,SUM(TA05.TA05_Volumen) as Volumen,TA05.TYP as Typ,CONVERT(varchar(6) ,TA05.StartTerm,112) as Periode,TA05.TA05_FirmaNr as FirmaNr from ( select T905_Nr ,TA05_Volumen,ta05_kd_aufnr ,TA05_FirmaNr -- ,MIN(TA06_Startterm_ist) as StartTerm, ,TA06_Startterm_ist as StartTerm ,Case when TA05_KD_AufNr < ''008'' then ''E'' else ''L'' end as Typ from TA05_FAK1 inner join TA06_FAD1 on TA06_FirmaNr = TA05_FirmaNr and TA06_FA_NR = TA05_FA_NR inner join T905_ArbMasch on T905_FirmaNr = TA06_FirmaNr and T905_nr = TA06_Platz_Ist -- inner join T904_Kostenstellen on T904_FirmaNR = T905_FirmaNr and T905_NR = T905_Nr where CONVERT(varchar(6),TA06_Startterm_ist,112) = ''$PERIODE'' -- and T904_GruppeNr = ''002'' and TA06_Platz_Ist like ''20%'' -- group by T905_Nr ,TA05_Volumen,ta05_kd_aufnr,TA05_FirmaNr ) TA05 group by TA05.T905_Nr,TA05.TYP,CONVERT(varchar(6),TA05.StartTerm,112),TA05.TA05_FirmaNr ) p pivot ( max(Volumen) for T905Nr in (' + @Colspvt + ') ) as pvt ) as a where FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' ' --select @cols --select @sql execute (@sql) 2SA00CellSelect

SC_Main.Panel1 Top 400 TA20_FUHAVIEW_TA20FUHATA20_FUHA declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + convert(varchar(4),TA20_ArtGr2) + '] as ' + TA20_ArtGr2, ' [' + convert(varchar(4),TA20_ArtGr2) + '] as ' + TA20_ArtGr2) FROM TA20_Artikel where TA20_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' group by TA20_ArtGr2 ORDER BY TA20_ArtGr2 SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(4),TA20_ArtGr2) + ']', ' [' + convert(varchar(4),TA20_ArtGr2) + ']') FROM TA20_Artikel where TA20_FirmaNr = 'TE' group by TA20_ArtGr2 ORDER BY TA20_ArtGr2 set @sql=' select * from ( select FirmaNr,Periode,TYP ,' + @cols + ' from ( select TA05.TA20_ArtGr2 as ArtGr2,SUM(TA05.TA05_Volumen) as Volumen,TA05.TYP as Typ,CONVERT(varchar(6) ,TA05.StartTerm,112) as Periode,TA05.TA05_FirmaNr as FirmaNr from ( select TA20_ArtGr2 ,TA05_Volumen,ta05_kd_aufnr ,ta05_fa_nr ,TA05_FirmaNr -- ,MIN(TA06_Startterm_ist) as StartTerm ,TA06_Startterm_ist as StartTerm ,Case when TA05_KD_AufNr < ''008'' then ''E'' else ''L'' end as Typ from TA05_FAK1 inner join TA06_FAD1 on TA06_FirmaNr = TA05_FirmaNr and TA06_FA_NR = TA05_FA_NR inner join TA20_Artikel on TA20_FirmaNr = TA05_FirmaNr and TA20_NR = TA05_ArtikelNr where CONVERT(varchar(6),TA06_Startterm_ist,112) = ''$PERIODE'' and TA06_Platz_Ist like ''20%'' -- group by TA20_ArtGr2 ,TA05_Volumen,ta05_kd_aufnr,ta05_fa_nr,TA05_FirmaNr ) TA05 group by TA05.TA20_ArtGr2,TA05.TYP,CONVERT(varchar(6),TA05.StartTerm,112),TA05.TA05_FirmaNr ) p pivot ( max(Volumen) for ArtGr2 in (' + @Colspvt + ') ) as pvt ) as a where FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' ' execute (@sql) 2SA00CellSelect

SC_Main.Panel1 Top 400 TA03_PIVOTTA03TA03_PIVOT declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + convert(varchar(3),T907_Spalte) + '] as ' + T907_Nr, ' [' + convert(varchar(3),T907_Spalte) + '] as ' + T907_Nr) FROM T907_schleuse where T907_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' group by T907_Spalte,T907_Nr ORDER BY T907_Spalte SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + convert(varchar(3),T907_Spalte) + ']', ' [' + convert(varchar(3),T907_Spalte) + ']') FROM T907_schleuse where T907_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' group by T907_Spalte,T907_Nr ORDER BY T907_Spalte set @sql=' select * from ( select TA03_FirmaNr,TA03_FA_Nr,' + @cols + ' from (Select TA03_FirmaNr,ta03_fa_nr,TA03_Schleuse, TA03_auf_stat from TA03_FAS01 ) p pivot (max(ta03_auf_stat) for Ta03_Schleuse in (' + @Colspvt + ')) as pvt ) as a where TA03_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' _WHEREADD ' execute (@sql) 2SA00CellSelect

SC_Main.Panel1 Top 400 C952_PIVOTC952C952_PIVOT declare @cols nvarchar(2000) declare @colspvt nvarchar(2000) declare @sql nvarchar(4000) SELECT @cols = COALESCE(@cols + ',[' + T914_Nr + '] as _' + T914_Nr, ' [' + T914_Nr + '] as _' + T914_Nr) FROM T914_Lohnarten where T914_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and (not T914_NrDatev = '' ) group by T914_Nr,T914_Bez ORDER BY T914_Nr SELECT @colspvt = COALESCE(@colspvt + ',[' + T914_Nr + ']', ' [' + T914_Nr + ']') FROM T914_Lohnarten where T914_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and (not T914_NrDatev = '' ) group by T914_Nr,T914_Bez ORDER BY T914_Nr set @sql=' select * from ( select C952_FirmaNr,C952_Periode,C952_PersNr,' + @cols + ' from (Select C952_FirmaNr,C952_Periode,C952_PersNr,C952_Lohnart,C952_Betrag from C952_Buchungssummen ) p pivot (max(C952_Betrag) for C952_Lohnart in (' + @Colspvt + ')) as pvt ) as a where C952_FirmaNr = ''G_COMPNR'' _WHEREADD ' execute (@sql) 2SA00CellSelect

REP_K001_TA40.rpt TA40_Planung_01
SELECT TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_KWPlan, T905_ArbMasch.T905_Bez, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Name, TA40_Vorname, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Schicht, sum(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 1 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS MO, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 2 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS DI, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum)= 3 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS MI, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 4 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS DO, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 5 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS FR, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 6 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS SA, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 7 THEN case when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art = 'AN') then 1 when (T926_Typ = 'A' and T926_Art <> 'AN') then 2 when (T926_Typ = 'G') then 5 when (T926_Typ = 'U') then 8 else 0 end ELSE 0 END) AS SO FROM TA40_Planung_01 inner join T940_Kalender on T940_FirmaNr = TA40_FirmaNr and T940_Datum = TA40_Datum and T940_Nr = TA40_Nr INNER JOIN T905_ArbMasch ON TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR = T905_ArbMasch.T905_FirmaNr AND TA40_Planung_01.TA40_ArbMasch = T905_ArbMasch.T905_NR INNER JOIN T901_Firma ON TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR = T901_Firma.T901_NR inner join t925_zeitarten on t925_firmanr = T940_firmanr and t925_nr = t940_zeitart inner join t926_zeitarten_gr on t926_firmanr = T925_firmanr and t926_nr = t925_gruppe where TA40_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and TA40_KWPlan = _DATEKW and TA40_Datum BETWEEN '01.01._DATEJAHR' and '31.12._DATEJAHR' GROUP BY TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_KWPlan, T905_ArbMasch.T905_Bez, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Schicht, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Name, TA40_Vorname,ta40_nr 1 1

REP_K001_TA40.rpt TA40_Planung_01
SELECT TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_KW, T905_ArbMasch.T905_Bez, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Name, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Schicht, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MO, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DI, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MI, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DO, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FR, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SA, SUM(CASE WHEN datepart(weekday, TA40_Datum) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SO, TA40_Vorname FROM TA40_Planung_01 INNER JOIN T905_ArbMasch ON TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR = T905_ArbMasch.T905_FirmaNr AND TA40_Planung_01.TA40_ArbMasch = T905_ArbMasch.T905_NR INNER JOIN T901_Firma ON TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR = T901_Firma.T901_NR where TA40_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and TA40_KW = _DATEKW and TA40_Datum BETWEEN '01.01._DATEJAHR' and '31.12._DATEJAHR' GROUP BY TA40_Planung_01.TA40_FirmaNR, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_KW, T905_ArbMasch.T905_Bez, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Schicht, TA40_Planung_01.TA40_Name, TA40_Vorname 1 1

TA51_FirmaNR = TA27_FirmaNR AND TA51_ZusArt = TA27_Nr RIGHT OUTER JOIN T904_Kostenstellen ON T910_Kst = T904_NR AND T910_FirmaNR = T904_FirmaNR WHERE (_TMPTABLE_User = 'G_USERID' ) and (TA51_Tagid >='_DATE_VON' and TA51_TagId <='_DATE_BIS' ) REP_TA51_FABuchungSum.rpt SELECT SUM(TA52_Soll_TE) AS TA52_Soll_TE, SUM(TA52_Soll_TR) AS TA52_Soll_TR, SUM(TA52_Soll_Zus) AS TA52_Soll_Zus, SUM(TA52_Soll_Abs) AS TA52_Soll_Abs, SUM(TA52_Ist_Akk) AS TA52_Ist_Akk, SUM(TA52_Ist_EA) AS TA52_Ist_EA, SUM(TA52_Ist_GK) AS TA52_Ist_GK, SUM(TA52_Ist_ZL) AS TA52_Ist_ZL, SUM(TA52_ZeitSumme) AS TA52_ZS, TA52_PersNr, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(varchar(12), TA52_Datum, 112), 1, 6) AS monat FROM _TMPTABLE INNER JOIN TA52_ZeitSum ON _TMPTABLE.PRT_TA51_Num1 = TA52_PersNr GROUP BY TA52_PersNr, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(varchar(12), TA52_Datum, 112), 1, 6) HAVING (SUBSTRING(CONVERT(varchar(12), TA52_Datum, 112), 1, 6) = '_DATEYEAR._DATEMONTH') and TA52_PersNr = '_TMPTABLE_nr' ORDER BY TA52_PersNr, T921_Nr SELECT PRT_T921_Zeitmodell_Detail_User, _TMPTABLE_ID,_TMPTABLE_Text1, T920_Nr, T920_GueltigAb, T920_Bez, T920_WeSchicht, T920_Aenderung, T920_Anlage, T920_User, T921_FirmaNR, T921_Nr, T921_GueltigAb, T921_TagesGruppe, T921_Bez, T921_BuArt, T921_Beginn_01, T921_Beginn_02, T921_Toleranz, T921_PA1, T921_PA1_Auto, T921_PA2, T921_PA2_Auto, T921_PA3, T921_PA3_Auto, T921_PA4, T921_PA4_Auto, T921_PA5, T921_PA5_Auto, T921_Ende_01, T921_Ende_02, T921_Normalzeit, T921_RundWert_01, T921_RundWert_02, T921_Aenderung, T921_Anlage, T921_User, T901_NR, T901_logo, T921_Schicht, PRT_T921_Zeitmodell_Detail_Num, T922_Pausen.T922_Anf + ' - ' + dbo.T922_Pausen.T922_End AS PA1, T922_Pausen_1.T922_Anf + ' - ' + T922_Pausen_1.T922_End AS PA2, T922_Pausen_2.T922_Anf + ' - ' + T922_Pausen_2.T922_End AS PA3, T922_Pausen_3.T922_Anf + ' - ' + T922_Pausen_3.T922_End AS PA4, T922_Pausen_4.T922_Anf + ' - ' + T922_Pausen_4.T922_End AS PA5 FROM T921_Zeitmodell_Details INNER JOIN T922_Pausen ON T921_FirmaNR = dbo.T922_Pausen.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = dbo.T922_Pausen.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = dbo.T922_Pausen.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = dbo.T922_Pausen.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = dbo.T922_Pausen.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_PA1 = dbo.T922_Pausen.T922_Nr INNER JOIN T922_Pausen AS T922_Pausen_1 ON T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_1.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_1.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_1.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_1.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_1.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_PA2 = T922_Pausen_1.T922_Nr INNER JOIN T922_Pausen AS T922_Pausen_2 ON T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_2.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_2.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_2.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_2.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_2.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_PA3 = T922_Pausen_2.T922_Nr INNER JOIN dbo.T922_Pausen AS T922_Pausen_3 ON T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_3.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_3.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_3.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_3.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_3.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_PA4 = T922_Pausen_3.T922_Nr INNER JOIN dbo.T922_Pausen AS T922_Pausen_4 ON T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_4.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_4.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_4.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_4.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_FirmaNR = T922_Pausen_4.T922_FirmaNR AND T921_PA5 = T922_Pausen_4.T922_Nr RIGHT OUTER JOIN T920_Zeitmodell_Kopf ON T921_FirmaNR = T920_FirmaNR AND T921_Nr = T920_Nr AND T921_GueltigAb = T920_GueltigAb LEFT OUTER JOIN T901_Firma ON T920_FirmaNR = T901_NR RIGHT OUTER JOIN _TMPTABLE ON T920_Nr = _TMPTABLE_Text1 WHERE (T921_FirmaNR = 'G_COMPNR') ORDER BY _TMPTABLE_ID 1

REP_K001_PULGL.rpt PULGL
Select T910_Nr,T910_Name,T910_Vorname , T910_Zuordnung from T910_Personalliste where $ZUORDNUNG T910_Nr T910 Select T910_Nr,T910_Vorname,T910_Name,t902_Bez,t902_nr,_TMPTABLE_id, T946V_Anspr = (Select Sum(T946_Ultage) from T946_Urlaubskonto,T966_Urlaubsart where T946_firmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T946_FirmaNr=T966_Firmanr and T946_persnr = T910_nr and T946_Ulart=T966_nr and T946_Jahr = SUBSTRING('_DATHEUTE', 7, 4) and T966_BuArt = 'S'), T946V_Gen = (Select Sum(T946_Ultage) from T946_Urlaubskonto,T966_Urlaubsart where T946_firmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T946_FirmaNr=T966_Firmanr and T946_persnr = T910_nr and T946_Ulart=T966_nr and T946_Jahr = SUBSTRING('_DATHEUTE', 7, 4) and T946_Datum <= '_DATHEUTE' and T966_BuArt ='B' and T946_Kategorie <> '040'), T946V_Gepl = (Select Sum(T946_Ultage) from T946_Urlaubskonto,T966_Urlaubsart where T946_firmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T946_FirmaNr=T966_Firmanr and T946_persnr = T910_nr and T946_Ulart=T966_nr and T946_Jahr = SUBSTRING('_DATHEUTE', 7, 4) and T946_Datum > '_DATHEUTE' and T966_BuArt ='B' and T946_Kategorie <> '040'), T946V_RestTage = (Select Sum(T946_Ultage) from T946_Urlaubskonto where T946_firmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T946_persnr = T910_nr and T946_Jahr = '_DATEYEAR' and T946_Kategorie <> '040'), T946V_RestStd = (Select Sum(T946_UlStd) from T946_Urlaubskonto where T946_firmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T946_persnr = T910_nr and T946_Jahr = '_DATEYEAR' and T946_Kategorie <> '040'), T945V_Ges = (Select Sum(T945_Stunde) from T945_Gleitzeitkonto where T945_FirmaNr = 'G_COMPNR' and T945_Persnr = T910_nr and T945_Datum >= '01' + substring('_DATHEUTE',3,8) and T945_Datum <= '_DATHEUTE' ) FROM T902_Abteilungstabelle INNER JOIN T910_Personalliste ON T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_FirmaNR = T910_Personalliste.T910_FirmaNR AND T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_NR = T910_Personalliste.T910_Zuordnung RIGHT OUTER JOIN _TMPTABLE ON T910_Personalliste.T910_Nr = _TMPTABLE_Num1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T946_UrlaubsKonto AS T946_UrlaubsKonto_1 ON T910_Personalliste.T910_FirmaNR = T946_UrlaubsKonto_1.T946_FirmaNr AND T910_Personalliste.T910_Nr = T946_UrlaubsKonto_1.T946_PersNr GROUP BY T910_Personalliste.T910_Nr, T910_Personalliste.T910_Name, T910_Personalliste.T910_Vorname, T910_Personalliste.T910_FirmaNR, T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_NR, T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_Bez, _TMPTABLE_ID T900_DG1K800_YYMMDD

Select T910_Nr,T910_Name,T910_Vorname from T910_Personalliste where $ZUORDNUNG T910_Nr T910 SELECT T945_GleitzeitKonto.*, T910_NR, T910_Name, T910_Personalliste.T910_Vorname, T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_Bez, T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_KurzKN, T914_Lohnarten.T914_Bez, T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_NR, PRT_T945.PRT_T945_ID, T901_Logo FROM T901_Firma INNER JOIN T945_GleitzeitKonto INNER JOIN T910_Personalliste ON T945_GleitzeitKonto.T945_PersNr = T910_Personalliste.T910_Nr AND T945_GleitzeitKonto.T945_FirmaNr = T910_Personalliste.T910_FirmaNR INNER JOIN T902_Abteilungstabelle ON T910_Personalliste.T910_FirmaNR = T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_FirmaNR AND T910_Personalliste.T910_Zuordnung = T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_NR ON T901_Firma.T901_NR = T902_Abteilungstabelle.T902_FirmaNR INNER JOIN T914_Lohnarten ON T945_GleitzeitKonto.T945_FirmaNr = T914_Lohnarten.T914_FirmaNr AND T945_GleitzeitKonto.T945_Lohnart = T914_Lohnarten.T914_Nr RIGHT OUTER JOIN PRT_T945 ON T945_GleitzeitKonto.T945_PersNr = PRT_T945.PRT_T945_Num1 where T945_Datum >= '01._DATEMONAT._DATEJAHR' and T945_Datum <= '_DATELASTDAYINMONTH' ORDER BY PRT_T945.PRT_T945_ID,T945_Datum T900_DG1K800_YYMMC T946_Nr T946_Datum 0

T910_Nr T910 SELECT T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_Datum, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_PersNr, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_ULArt, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_Kategorie, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_ULTage, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_ULStd, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_UnbTage, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_UnbStd, T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_Bem, T966_Urlaubsart.T966_Bez, T967_Urlaubskat.T967_Bez, T966_Urlaubsart.T966_BuArt, T967_Urlaubskat.T967_Sort, T910_Personalliste.T910_Nr, PRT_T946_ID,PRT_T946_Num1, T910_Personalliste.T910_Name, T910_Personalliste.T910_Vorname, T901_Firma.T901_logo, CASE WHEN T966_Urlaubsart.T966_Buart = 'S' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS Grup FROM T967_Urlaubskat INNER JOIN T946_UrlaubsKonto ON T967_Urlaubskat.T967_FirmaNr = T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_FirmaNr AND T967_Urlaubskat.T967_Nr = T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_Kategorie INNER JOIN T966_Urlaubsart ON T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_FirmaNr = T966_Urlaubsart.T966_FirmaNr AND T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_ULArt = T966_Urlaubsart.T966_Nr INNER JOIN T910_Personalliste ON T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_FirmaNr = T910_Personalliste.T910_FirmaNR AND T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_PersNr = T910_Personalliste.T910_Nr INNER JOIN T901_Firma ON T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_FirmaNr = T901_Firma.T901_NR INNER JOIN PRT_T946 ON T946_UrlaubsKonto.T946_PersNr = PRT_T946.PRT_T946_Num1 where T946_Datum <= '_DATHEUTE' ORDER BY 'Grup' T900_DG1K800_YYMMDD T946_Nr T946_Datum 1
